response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This exceptional item holds significant value and relevance to you, estimated at $800,000. Considering its unique attributes and the benefits it offers, we are extending a special offer to you. We propose to sell this product to you for $750,000. This price reflects our commitment to making such high-quality items accessible while ensuring a fair return on investment for us. Please let us know if you would like to proceed with this offer. We look forward to the possibility of serving you and providing you with unparalleled service and satisfaction.", "product_price": 750000}
